This is to inform the general public and prospective students of Osteopathic Medicine that the Marian University College of Osteopathic Medicine Marrian MU COM application portal 2024 is currently open until March 1, 2024.

Interested applicants are hereby advised to visit the AACOMAS application portal to apply for admission. The college process an early admission cycle.

Sometimes you may be worrying about how to gain admission to Marrian MU COM, and how to apply to Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medicine. Read through these documents for a better understanding.

How to Apply to Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medicine

Applying to Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medicine is done through the AACOMAS Application Service portal. Prospective students of Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medicine should note that Admission is complete when you follow the steps below;

  • Submit Primary Application through the AACOMAS Application Portal
  • The Secondary Application is reviewed by Marrian MU COM when the Application fee is paid.
  • Interview
  • Admission Offers
  • Fees Deposit
  • Course Enrolment

To learn about the AACOMAS Application, kindly click here

Applying to Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medical College 2024 – Requirements and Guides

Applying to the Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medical College 2024 is highly competitive and required good grade points and proper document submission to meet the competitive admission criteria.

To browse the Marrian MU COM Admission Requirement, Click here

How to Apply for Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medical Schools

The application for admission into various medical colleges is done through the American Association of Colleges of Osteopathic Medicine Application Service (AACOMAS) portal. The AACOMAS is the centralized application service for U.S. osteopathic medical schools.

To apply,

  • Visit https://aacomas.liaisoncas.com.
  • Login with your Username and password.
  • Fill and submit all required forms online.
  • Pay all application fees
  • Submit all academic documents
  • Submit a letter of Recommendation
  • Submit personal statement

When Is It Too Late to Apply to Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medicine

March 1, 2024, is the Deadline to apply for Marrian MU COM Osteopathic Medicine. Application deadline for different medical colleges differs. Ensure to visit the desired colleges to find an appropriate deadline before applying.
